record.field: - This group is to isolate features for users that doesn't have the right privileges to interact with SUNAT or to features of administrators of odoo-peru
- See all SUNAT documents as Invoices/Boletas and their electronic notes, CDR received as response and Daily Ticket and Voided Documents summaries generated and sent.

- If a user is given this group, then it can cancel documents out of the date. This group covers the necessity of covering the seven day of cancellation that usually happens during the update of a behavior in SUNAT
